meaning_mnemonic:
レントゲン comes from the German word "Röntgen" meaning <vocabulary>X-ray</vocabulary>, named after their inventor Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen.

If that’s news to you, here’s a mnemonic to help you remember: 

You’re planning to <reading>rent a Gen</reading>ji (レントゲン), but you ask Genji to get an <vocabulary>X-ray</vocabulary> first, just to make sure he’s in good health before signing the rental contract.
